explanation: 该论文主要关注山区极端降水事件的高分辨率定量降水估计（QPE）数据集的开发和应用。它使用逆向降雨校正（IRC）方法来改进NEXRAD Stage IV降水分析，以实现水文模型的校准和提高洪水估计的准确性。虽然涉及大气中的降水过程，但该研究的重点在于水文应用和模型，而非大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。
authors: Mochi Liao;Ana Barros
title: StageIV-IRC: A High-resolution Dataset of Extreme Orographic Quantitative Precipitation Estimates (QPE) Constrained to Water Budget Closure for Historical Floods in the Appalachian Mountains
abstract:
The StageIV-IRC is the first precipitation dataset developed for extreme precipitation events in the mountains. This dataset strongly suggest the use of Inverse Rainfall Correction (IRC) framework to produce physically-meaningful corrections for precipitation products in the mountains, where precipitation estimation is problematic due to topography blockage. Post-IRC precipitation estimation produces improved hydrological responses, and it shows a good agreement with raingauge observations. 
 Quantitative Flood Estimation (QFE) in complex terrain remains a grand challenge in operational hydrology due to the lack of accurate high-resolution Quantitative Precipitation Estimates (QPE) for operational forecasting and for calibrating hydrologic models. Here, we present a high-resolution (i.e., 250 m, 5-minute-hourly) QPE dataset for 215 extreme rainfall events occurred in 26 gauged mountainous basins in the Appalachian Mountains from 2008 to 2024. This dataset is developed by applying inverse rainfall corrections (IRC) derived from physically-based rainfall-runoff modeling (Liao and Barros, 2022 and 2023) to the Next Generation Weather Radar (NEXRAD) Stage IV analysis (4 km resolution, hourly). The corrected Stage IV analysis QPE is referred to as StageIV-IRC (StageIV with Inverse Rainfall Correction). The unique advantage of this StageIV-IRC QPE dataset is its agreement with ground-based rainfall measurements while achieving water budget closure at the storm-flood event scale within observational uncertainty of streamflow observations, which is the gold standard in hydrological modeling. This dataset is the first QPE dataset aiming to improve QFE in the complex terrain by reducing biases for extreme precipitation events, and it can be used to evaluate the skill of hydrologic models in the same basins and support model calibration. The StageIV-IRC QPE dataset is publicly available at https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.14028866, and improved initial soil moisture maps for the studied extreme precipitation events, derived from the same IRC framework, are available in the same repository (Liao and Barros, 2025c).

explanation: 该论文的标题和摘要主要关注全球钒循环以及其可持续供应。虽然钒可能以微量形式存在于大气颗粒物中，但该研究的核心似乎并非直接关于大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。因此，它与大气环境遥感技术的关联性较低。

explanation: 该研究的标题和摘要表明，它主要关注长期暴露于多种空气污染物与中风发病率之间的关系。虽然涉及空气污染物，但研究重点是流行病学和健康影响评估，而非大气环境遥感技术。因此，它与空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析等遥感技术没有直接关联。研究使用了一种名为“形状约束非线性加权和模型”的统计方法来分析空气污染与中风风险之间的关系，旨在评估空气污染对人类健康的长期影响。

explanation: 这篇论文主要关注的是城市环境中的地表覆盖变化，并提出了一种新的地表覆盖发现映射（LCDM）方法，用于识别和分类城市中不断出现的新型地表覆盖类型。该方法利用3D遥感数据（如LiDAR点云）来监测城市地貌的动态变化，并生成最新的地表覆盖地图。虽然地表覆盖的变化可能会间接影响局部气候和资源流动，但论文的核心内容并非直接涉及大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术的关联性较弱。
authors: Jing Du;John Zelek;Dedong Zhang;Jonathan Li
title: 3DLCDM: Hybrid supervision for land cover discovery mapping of emerging urban structures in 3D remote sensing
abstract:
•Propose Land Cover Discovery Mapping (LCDM) for dynamic urban environments. •3DLCDM framework integrates supervised learning with novel class discovery. •Dual-branch prototype learning with progressive scheduling for urban features. •Dynamic weighting strategy effectively addresses severe class imbalance. 
 Urban environments are characterized by continuous transformation, with new buildings, innovative infrastructures, evolving landforms, and emerging vegetation constantly reshaping the urban fabric. These dynamic changes create previously unannotated land cover classes that modify surface albedo, alter drainage patterns, and influence carbon storage, thereby affecting local climates, resource flows, and ecosystem services. Therefore, traditional land cover mapping methods based on static semantic labels are inherently limited. Even the most meticulously annotated datasets cannot comprehensively account for the full spectrum of urban classes. As urban environments continue to evolve, these static methods fail to capture the continual appearance of previously unannotated classes. This limitation leads to maps that quickly become outdated, incomplete, and imprecise, thereby impeding accurate environmental monitoring. To address this critical challenge, we propose Land Cover Discovery Mapping (LCDM), which integrates novel class discovery with land cover mapping, and we present an innovative end-to-end hybrid supervision framework, 3DLCDM, to implement LCDM in 3D remote sensing. The system has been tested on two high-resolution 3D point cloud datasets: one acquired via airborne LiDAR in Canada and the other obtained primarily using UAV-based LiDAR in Germany. Experimental results reveal that our 3DLCDM framework increases the mIoU for novel classes by up to 16.95% on the DALES dataset and up to 24.43% on the H3D dataset compared to baseline methods, demonstrating effective discovery capabilities under evaluation conditions that are procedurally equivalent to encountering genuinely novel urban features in practice. The proposed 3DLCDM framework demonstrates the potential to enable the continuous generation of up-to-date land cover maps that capture dynamic changes in urban morphology, thereby significantly advancing land cover discovery mapping. Furthermore, strong generalization across multiple datasets and urban feature types demonstrates the robustness of the framework’s discovery mechanisms and its capability to deliver high-fidelity maps that scale across diverse urban environments.

explanation: 该研究主要关注青藏高原大气水汽的捕获能力（CAW）及其演变模式，探讨了气候变化背景下大气水向降水的转化过程。研究使用了多种降水数据集和大气水通量数据，分析了CAW的时空变化特征，并揭示了影响CAW演变的气象因素和大气环流模式。虽然研究涉及大气水汽，但其重点在于水资源管理和气候适应策略，而非直接涉及空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析等大气环境遥感技术。
authors: Hou-Liang Lu;Han Zhou;Hui-Min Zuo;Yu-Fei Jiao;Bill X. Hu
title: Analysis of the evolutionary patterns and drivers of Capturability of Atmospheric Water (CAW) on the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau
abstract:
•The QTP is a sensitive area for the evolution of Capturability of Atmospheric Water (CAW). •CAW on the QTP is characterized by a dipole evolution pattern, with strengthening in the north and weakening in the south. •Total cloud cover, actual evapotranspiration and East Asian monsoon dominate CAW enhancement on the northeastern QTP. •Potential evapotranspiration and South Asian monsoon dominate the weakening of CAW in the southeastern QTP. 
 The Qinghai-Tibet Plateau (QTP) is a climate-sensitive region with profound implications for the atmospheric water cycle in both Asia and the globe. While global warming has increased precipitation and atmospheric water-holding capacity, energy constraints prevent a proportional relationship between atmospheric water content and global mean precipitation changes. In this study, we utilized multi-source precipitation datasets (ERA5-Land, CPC, CRU, CMAP, GPCP) and atmospheric water flux data (ERA5) to investigate the conversion of atmospheric water to precipitation, a fundamental water cycle process, across the QTP and its surrounding regions from 1979 to 2020 using the Capturability of Atmospheric Water (CAW) index. Our findings reveal a dipole evolution pattern in CAW, with strengthening in the north and weakening in the south. The QTP, a positive mismatch region with limited atmospheric water but efficient precipitation conversion, is highly sensitive to climate change. The evolution of CAW is driven by meteorological factors, with cloud cover and actual evapotranspiration enhancing CAW in the northeastern QTP, while potential evapotranspiration weakens CAW in the southeastern QTP. On a larger scale, CAW evolution is modulated by large-scale atmospheric circulation patterns, where the East Asian summer monsoon enhances CAW in the northeast, while the South Asian summer monsoon weakens CAW in the southeast. Additionally, a qualitative assessment of atmospheric water resource potential, integrating CAW and water vapor transport flux, identifies four distinct development models. These findings provide critical insights for water resource management and climate adaptation strategies in the QTP.

explanation: 该论文的标题和摘要主要关注的是聚合物微波整流器，特别是通过单层离子化供体实现的整流器。这属于材料科学和电子工程领域，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关联。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术的相关性较低。
authors: Nobutaka Osakabe;Jeongeun Her;Takahiro Kaneta;Akiko Tajima;Elena Longhi;Kan Tang;Kazuhiro Fujimori;Stephen Barlow;Seth R. Marder;Shun Watanabe;Jun Takeya;Yu Yamashita
title: Polymeric microwave rectifiers enabled by monolayer-thick ionized donors

explanation: 该研究的标题和摘要表明，它主要关注亨廷顿蛋白与F-肌动蛋白复合物的结构，以及该复合物在细胞骨架组织中的作用。这属于细胞生物学和分子生物学领域，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关联。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术无关。
authors: Rémi Carpentier;Jaesung Kim;Mariacristina Capizzi;Hyeongju Kim;Florian Fäßler;Jesse M. Hansen;Min Jeong Kim;Eric Denarier;Béatrice Blot;Marine Degennaro;Sophia Labou;Isabelle Arnal;Maria J. Marcaida;Matteo Dal Peraro;Doory Kim;Florian K. M. Schur;Ji-Joon Song;Sandrine Humbert
title: Structure of the Huntingtin F-actin complex reveals its role in cytoskeleton organization

explanation: 该标题和摘要主要关注热辐射的偏振涡旋现象，这属于物理光学领域。虽然热辐射与大气环境有关，但该研究更侧重于辐射本身的特性，而不是大气成分分析、空气质量监测或卫星观测等大气环境遥感技术。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术的关联性不强。
authors: Ye Zhang;Qiang Wang;Meng Xiao;Tao Liu;Fan Zhong;Zhenxin Lai;Shining Zhu;Hui Liu
title: Polarization vortices of thermal emission

explanation: 该论文主要研究半导体/助催化剂界面在光驱动下的氧化还原动态过程，利用原位X射线吸收光谱技术进行分析。虽然光催化过程可能与大气环境中的污染物降解相关，但从标题和摘要来看，该研究的重点在于材料科学和化学反应机制，而非直接针对大气环境遥感技术，例如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术的关联性不强。
authors: Raffaello Mazzaro;Alberto Piccioni;Marco Salvi;Pierpaolo Vecchi;Michele Mazzanti;Stefano Caramori;Federico Boscherini;Luca Pasquini
title: Operando x-ray absorption spectroscopy unveils light-driven redox dynamics at the semiconductor/cocatalyst interface

explanation: 该研究的标题和摘要主要关注的是α细胞处理胰高血糖素原肽以及控制胰岛素分泌的机制，属于生物医学领域，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术无关。
authors: Canqi Cui;Danielle C. Leander;Sarah M. Gray;Kimberley El;Alex Chen;Paul A. Grimsrud;Jessica O. Becker;Austin Taylor;Guo-Fang Zhang;Kyle W. Sloop;C. Bruce Verchere;Andrew N. Hoofnagle;David A. D’Alessio;Jonathan E. Campbell
title: α cells use both PC1/3 and PC2 to process proglucagon peptides and control insulin secretion

explanation: 该论文主要研究液滴在图案化液体表面的润湿行为，重点在于多重平衡态如何影响润湿的可调性。这属于流体物理和材料科学的范畴，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关联。论文关注的是液滴的物理特性和表面相互作用，而不是大气环境的遥感探测或数据分析。
authors: Xitong Zhang;Hongyu Zhao;Jack R. Panter;Glen McHale;Gary G. Wells;Rodrigo Ledesma-Aguilar;Halim Kusumaatmaja
title: Multiple equilibria enables tunable wetting of droplets on patterned liquid surfaces

explanation: 该标题和摘要主要关注的是界面太阳能蒸发技术在盐水矿物回收方面的应用。它与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。该研究似乎侧重于材料科学、化学工程和水资源管理领域，而不是大气科学。
authors: Kaijie Yang;Meiqi Yang;Hongxu Chen;Sunxiang Zheng;Aashish Khandelwal;Rodney D. Priestley;Zhiyong Jason Ren
title: Interfacial solar evaporation transforms brine mineral recovery
